title: MG ZS EV review: is this the best-value electric car on sale?
text:
You’ll probably have read, by now, my esteemed colleague Mr English’s review of the Porsche Taycan high-performance electric car which went live on these very pages a few days ago. If you haven’t, read it now, and then come back here. I’ll wait.

Done? Good. Now that you’re all up to speed on one of the priciest and most glamorous electric cars to go on sale this year, it’s time to tell you about one that… isn’t.

In fact, the MG ZS EV sits right at the opposite end of the electric car spectrum to the Taycan. It can’t go as far on a single charge (163 miles), and nor can it go as fast (just 87mph). And nor, let’s face it, is it quite as striking to look at.

But none of this matters, because the...
